original_text: I will cause terrible things to happen to you. You will come to a complete end. People will look for you, but they will never find you. That is what the Almighty Lord says.’ I will cause terrible things to happen to you. You will come to a complete end. People will look for you, but they will never find you. That is what the Almighty Lord says.’
korean_text: 내가 너를 패망하게 하여 다시 있지 못하게 하리니 사람이 비록 너를 찾으나 다시는 영원히 만나지 못하리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will cause terrible things to happen to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 무서운 일들을 일으킬 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will come to a complete end.
but they will never find you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 결코 너를 찾지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Almighty Lord says.'
